aka: 找到那个愚蠢小婊子，把她扔进河里

cast.name: 尼诺·登·布雷夫 Nino den Brave

this_title: Find This Dumb Little Bitch and Throw Her Into a River
trans_title: 找到那个愚蠢小婊子，把她扔进河里
introduction: In a careless act, Remco (15), posts an upsetting video of his little sister throwing living puppies into a river, on the Internet. The video quickly spreads across the world, raising the question who this 'dumb little bitch' is and where she can be found.
foreign_title: Find This Dumb Little Bitch and Throw Her Into a River
